Write-Up Text: People took to social media to express their views and concerns regarding the upcoming Federal Budget. Some praised potential policies such as the boost in female trade apprenticeships and responsible cost-of-living relief while others criticised the possibility of cuts to infrastructure projects. There seems to be a growing discontentment over the small expected boost to JobSeeker for those over the age of 55. Anxieties also arose regarding the accuracy of budget surplus forecasts and the impact of increased street light charges on already struggling communities. Finally some have expressed optimism towards labour promises hoping for reduced power bills and investments in regional infrastructure.
